params._commitDuration: Unix time period till the voters commit there vote

params._revealDuration: Unix time period till the voters reveal there vote starts when commit duration ends

changeDefaultExemptedVotersListMulti(add.notice: Change the global exempted voters list

getBallotCommitRevealDuration(uint256).notice: Return the commit relveal time duration of ballot

getBallotDetails(uint256).notice: Get the details of the ballot

getBallotResults(uint256).notice: Queries the result of a given ballot

getCurrentBallotStage(uint256).notice: Used to get the current stage of the ballot

getDataStore().notice: used to return the data store address of securityToken

getInitFunction().notice: This function returns the signature of configure function

getPermissions().notice: Return the permissions flag that are associated with CountTransferManager

isVoterAllowed(uint256,address).notice: Use to check whether the voter is allowed to vote or not
